New Records: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored a season-high 39 points in 29 minutes
Key Match Events: The Thunder had a 36-12 run in the first half en route to a 70-43 lead
Pre-Game Insights: The Thunder were coming off a 129-122 loss at NBA-leading Cleveland
Post-Match Reflections: The Thunder bounced back from a loss to the Cavaliers with a strong performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Madison Square Garden, the Knicks' home court
Others: The Thunder's victory ended a 15-game winning streak being snapped previously
